name: Verra Mobility Corporation
description: Verra Mobility Corporation is a leading provider of technology-driven solutions that improve the safety and efficiency of transportation systems. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Mesa, Arizona, Verra Mobility specializes in providing services related to vehicle registration, tolling, and enforcement, as well as fleet management solutions. The company operates through a combination of innovative software platforms and integrated services, aimed at simplifying the mobility experience for both consumers and municipalities. Verra Mobility connects people with transportation, providing smart solutions that help cities manage their infrastructure while reducing congestion and improving overall public safety. Their offerings include automated tolling systems, photo enforcement technology, and efficient vehicle registration services, catering to a diverse clientele that includes governmental agencies, private fleets, and rental car companies. With a strong focus on technology, Verra Mobility leverages data analytics and advanced software to enhance operational efficiencies and optimize fleet management. The company's mission is centered around creating safer roadways and more efficient transportation systems, helping communities thrive in an increasingly mobile world.
